text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا فُتِنُوا۟ ثُمَّ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ وَصَبَرُوٓا۟ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهَا لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya Tuhanmu (pelindung) bagi orang-orang yang berhijrah sesudah menderita cobaan, kemudian mereka berjihad dan sabar; sesungguhnya Tuhanmu sesudah itu benar-benar Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
